document.evidence: Chinese word segmentation ( CWS ) is a necessary step in Chinese-English statistical machine translation ( SMT ) and its performance has an impact on the results of SMT .
document.text: Chinese word segmentation ( CWS ) is a necessary step in Chinese-English statistical machine translation ( SMT ) and its performance has an impact on the results of SMT .
However , there are many settings involved in creating a CWS system such as various specifications and CWS methods .
This paper investigates the effect of these settings to SMT .

document.evidence: We tested dictionarybased and CRF-based approaches and found there was no significant difference between the two in the qualty of the resulting translations .
document.text: We tested dictionarybased and CRF-based approaches and found there was no significant difference between the two in the qualty of the resulting translations .

document.evidence: We also found the correlation between the CWS F-score and SMT BLEU score was very weak .
document.text: We also found the correlation between the CWS F-score and SMT BLEU score was very weak .

This paper also proposes two methods of combining advantages of different specifications : a simple concatenation of training data and a feature interpolation approach in which the same types of features of translation models from various CWS schemes are linearly interpolated .

document.evidence: We found these approaches were very effective in improving quality of translations .
document.text: We found these approaches were very effective in improving quality of translations .

document.evidence: We investigated the effect of CWS on SMT from two points of view .
document.text: We investigated the effect of CWS on SMT from two points of view .
Firstly , we analyzed multiple CWS specifications and built a CWS for each one to examine how they affected translations .

document.evidence: Secondly , we investigated the advantages and disadvantages of various CWS approaches , both dictionary-based and CRF-based , and built CWSs using these approaches to examine their effect on translations .

document.evidence: We proposed a new approach to linear interpolation of translation features .
